teamchest.unlocked.subtitle: A scalleywag unlocked the Treasure!

armor.hat.mvp.all_three: Most Ship Damage, Kills, and Deaths!

weakpoint.destroyed.all_enemy: All enemy Weakpoints have been destroyed!
item.crab_trap.lore.1: When a Crab walks inta this trap, ye can
item.crab_trap.lore.2: carry it n' release it wherever ye want.
cannonball.tracer.lore.2: consume any Gunpowder in a Cannon.
cannonball.tracer.lore.4: which be only apparent to its user.
cannonball.normal.lore: The most basic type o' Cannonball.
cannonball.hot.lore.1: On impact, sets an area around
cannonball.gas.lore.1: On impact, releases a toxic cloud
cannonball.chain.lore.2: by a chain. A little less accurate,
cannonball.chain.lore.3: but it has a wider area of effect.
cannonball.bouncy.lore.3: Each time it bounces, it blasts
cannonball.golden.lore.2: The most fancy type o' Cannonball!
cannonball.golden.lore.4: their users when they damage ships
cannonball.player.lore.2: shootin' the barrel that ye're inside of.
cannonball.player.lore.3: Deals no damage to blocks or pirates.
item.raid_horn.lore.2: give yer entire crew a buff.
item.harpoon.lore.1: Ye can use this weapon to
item.blast_barrel.lore.2: to increase power and punch to ignite!
item.gunpowder.lore: Used to change the power of a Cannon shot.
item.rock.lore.4: while ye wait for the game
tutorial.ship_timer.second: The Trainin' Ship will repair itself in %s second!
tutorial.ship_timer.seconds: The Trainin' Ship will repair itself in %1$s seconds!
tutorial.description: Here ye can learn about important game mechanics by talkin' to the Pirate Teachers at each area and tryin' things out for yerself!
tutorial.note: (Speak to all 4 Pirate Teachers on this island to get rid of these notifications.)
chest.skeleton.warn: This be a %1$s! Ye need a %2$s in order to unlock it!
tip.1: If ye want to shoot a Cannonball more towards the left or right, ye can put unequal amounts o' Gunpowder inta a Cannon's Gunpowder slots.
tip.2: In order to shoot a Cannonball ye need to place Gunpowder in at least one of the 2 slots on the sides of the Cannon.
tip.3: All Cannonballs have different properties. Make sure to read the item lore to see what they do.
tip.4: Fire placed by Hot Cannonballs will deal extra damage to a ship once it extinguishes.
tip.5: Pirates only regenerate health on their own ship or by usin' Golden Apples.
tip.6: Cannonball Clusters be weak against ships, but they'll kill pirates wit' ease.
tip.7: Use yer Spottin' Spyglass to locate and temporarily expose Weakpoints on the scallywag ship.
tip.8: Usin' a Harpoon underwater will allow ye to perform a quick dash.
tip.9: Ye can use a Skeleton Key to open the Team Treasure of yer enemies or open Skeleton Treasures.
tip.10: Killin' a scallywag regenerates a little bit o' health.
tip.11: Pirates drop a small amount o' Doubloons on death.
tip.12: If ye die, ye lose all items ye were carryin' wit' ye.
tip.13: Share any leftover resources wit' yer mateys either by droppin' 'em or puttin' 'em inta the Team Treasure on yer ship.
tip.14: Destroyin' weakpoints be the best way to deal a lot of damage to ships.
tip.15: Ye deal significantly less damage when ye board the scallywag ship. Only board the scallywag ship if ye intend on raidin' their Team Treasure.
tip.16: Gas Cannonballs leave a cloud o' Gas that weaken and damage any pirates who get inside it.
tip.17: Bouncy Cannonballs will blow up randomly after bouncin' around for a little bit.
tip.18: 10 Gunpowder be a good amount to keep in mind if ye want to hit the hull of a ship.
tip.19: Ye can remove Gunpowder from the Gunpowder slots of a Cannon by interactin' wit' 'em while ye're not holdin' Gunpowder in yer hand.
tip.20: Tracer Cannonball shots don't consume any Gunpowder! Ye can use 'em to get a rough estimate of where yer shot will land.
tip.21: Chain Cannonballs be a little less accurate than the other Cannonball types, but can deal a lot of damage to a ship's sails.
tip.games: (Play %s more games to be able to hide tips.)
tip.game: (Play %s more game to be able to hide tips.)
tip.enabled: Ye have enabled ingame tips. Ye can disable 'em usin' yer Lobby Book.
tip.disabled: Ye have disabled ingame tips. Ye can re-enable 'em usin' yer Lobby Book.
tip.cannot_disable.one: Ye cannot do this until ye play 1 more game.
tip.cannot_disable: Ye cannot do this until ye play %s more games.
achievement.bonus_goals.description: Optional objectives that ye can just complete for the fun of it.
achievement.love_rocks.description: While waitin' for the game to start, throw 50 Rocks in one sittin'.
achievement.robbery.description: Unlock the enemy Team Treasure usin' a Skeleton Key.
achievement.credits.description: Interact wit' the Lobby's Credit armor stands.
achievement.cannoneer.description: Use all of the different Cannonball types ingame. (All time)
achievement.watchtower.description: Talk to the Pirate Teacher at the Watchtower.
achievement.treasure_pit.description: Talk to the Pirate Teacher at the Treasure Pit.
achievement.training_island.description: Learn about the game on the Trainin' Island!
achievement.combat_area.description: Talk to the Pirate Teacher at the Combat Area.
achievement.cannon_dock.description: Talk to the Pirate Teacher at the Cannon Dock.
achievement.parrot.description: Pet the parrot 50 times in a row...
achievement.planetary_pirates.descriptio: A space helmet and a weapon that seems to be inspired by Meteor Miner technology. Looks like these pirates want to go to space...
achievement.rocket_riders.description: Just 3 Rocket Riders, flyin' inta the atmosphere... Sort of...
achievement.easter_egg.description: Ye found all the Easter Eggs!
teacher.weakpoint.1: Welcome to the Watchtower! Here, ye can learn what Weakpoints be and how to spot 'em.
teacher.weakpoint.2: All pirates carry a Spottin' Spyglass. But this isn't just yer ordinary Spyglass: ye can use this one to spot special Weakpoints on the enemy ship.
teacher.weakpoint.3: While lookin' through the Spottin' Spyglass, ye'll notice a subtle white X shape on the enemy ship. In order to expose the Weakpoint, ye need to look at the X for 3 seconds.
teacher.weakpoint.4: Once a Weakpoint be exposed, it will become temporarily visible for yer entire team. The X shape will turn red and then fade to white over time, indicatin' that it's becomin' unexposed. Ye can always spot it again to re-expose it.
teacher.weakpoint.5: Hittin' exposed Weakpoints wit' any Cannonball (besides the Pirate and Tracer ones) will deal a ton of extra damage, so make sure to spot those Weakpoints and aim yer shots to try and hit em!
teacher.weakpoint.6: Once ye hit one Weakpoint, the next one becomes visible. Keep on spottin' and hittin' 'em until there be none left!
teacher.weakpoint.7: Note that ye can only spot one Weakpoint at a time in a real game. However, here at the Watchtower, ye can see multiple at once just so ye can get a feel for exposin' 'em.
teacher.weakpoint.8: Now it's yer turn. Use yer Spottin' Spyglass to expose some Weakpoints!
teacher.combat.1: Ahoy, welcome to the Combat Area! I'm here to teach ye about all the different weapons in Crafty Cannoneers. Grab some for yerself from the Weapon Rack behind me!
teacher.combat.2: In a real game, pirates be always equipped wit' a Cutlass and a Hand Crossbow. Other weapons can be found in different types o' Treasure Chests.
teacher.combat.3: Ye can see which type o' Treasure Chest a weapon can be found in by lookin' at the color of its handle.
teacher.combat.4: A blue handle means that the weapon can be found in Uncommon Treasure Chests, while a purple handle means it can be found in Rare Treasure Chests.
teacher.combat.5: Each weapon has its own damage and attack speed. Some even have some special properties, like the Boardin' Axe and the Harpoon. Read the item descriptions in yer inventory to learn more about em!
teacher.combat.6: The Combat Area also has a bunch o' Trainin' Dummies! These guys have the same health and armor stats as any other Pirate. Ye can use 'em to practice yer combat skills and find yer favorite weapons.
teacher.combat.7: Go ahead, grab yerself some weapons and start beatin' up those Trainin' Dummies!
teacher.chest.1: Welcome to the Treasure Pit! Here, ye can learn about Treasure Chests and practice lootin' 'em for yerself.
teacher.chest.2: There be 4 types o' Treasure Chests which can be found on the small island in the middle of the map. All of 'em contain different items, and the rarer the Treasure is, the better loot ye'll find inside.
teacher.chest.skeleton.contents: Doubloons, Gunpowder, Arrows, and Golden Cannonballs.
teacher.chest.rare.contents: Doubloons, Gunpowder, Cannonballs, Blast Bombs, Blast Barrels, Arrows, Golden Apples, Trooper Ale, Shields, Rare Weapons, and Special Cannonballs.
teacher.chest.uncommon.contents: Doubloons, Gunpowder, Cannonballs, Blast Bombs, Arrows, Golden Apples, Trooper Ale, Shields, and Uncommon Weapons.
teacher.chest.common.contents: Doubloons, Gunpowder, Cannonballs, Blast Bombs, Arrows, and Golden Apples
teacher.chest.3: It's good to stick around on the island and take as much loot from the Treasure Chests as possible. But be careful: if ye die, ye lose all the items ye were carryin' wit' ye!
teacher.chest.4: Ye can use Doubloons to purchase special Cannonballs from the Pirate Traders on yer ship.
teacher.chest.5: Go on, start lootin' some treasure here to see what it's like!
teacher.cannon.1: Cannons be the main gameplay element of Crafty Cannoneers. Ye use 'em to destroy the enemy ship or kill scalleywags occupyin' the center island. Here at the Cannon Dock, ye can learn how to become a true cannoneer!
teacher.cannon.2: Cannons have 2 slots on the sides. If ye click on these slots wit' Gunpowder, ye'll fill up a part of the slot. Each slot can store up to 7 Gunpowder.
teacher.cannon.3: The more Gunpowder ye put in the Cannon, the stronger the shot will be. Ye can also use the Gunpowder slots to aim yer shot in a given direction by loadin' more Gunpowder in one slot than the other.
teacher.cannon.4: Once ye're done loadin' up Gunpowder, ye can shoot a Cannonball by placin' it at the back of the Cannon. The Cannon takes a few seconds to fire up, and then... thar she blows!
teacher.cannon.5: Ye can preview yer shot without losin' Gunpowder by shootin' a Tracer Cannonball instead. Tracer Cannonballs leave a green particle trail that only ye can see, and ye get 'em back once they hit somethin'. Ye also spawn wit' 'em!
teacher.cannon.6: There be other special Cannonballs that ye can find in Treasure Chests or buy at yer ship. These have unique properties, so make sure ye read the item descriptions in yer inventory to learn about what they do!
teacher.cannon.7: What're ye waitin' for? Start shootin' some Cannons and see if ye can hit those Weakpoints!
parkour.left_canceled: Ye left the game, so yer Parkour run be canceled.
parkour.personal_best: That's a new personal best time!
error.parkour: An error has occurred, so the Parkour leaderboard has been reset. If ye see this message, %s
error.game: An error has occurred, so the game has been reset to defaults. If ye see this message, %s
error.discord: Report on the Zeronia Discord server
game.seagulls: Fly inta a ring o' seagulls to stop spectatin'!
game.take_off: Ye can take off yer %s to leave the game!
game.watch_game: Feel free to spectate this game instead.
game.waiting_ready: Waitin' for teams to ready up...
game.countdown.canceled: Countdown canceled! Both teams need at least 1 pirate.
game.countdown.ten_seconds: The game will begin in 10 seconds!
game.left_spectator: %s be no longer spectatin' the game.
game.spectator_bounds: Unable to spectate outside of the arena!
game.in_progress: A game be currently in progress!
game.bubble_column: A bubble column blocks yer path...
game.no_players: No pirates remainin'. The previous game has been canceled.
game.mob_warn: This server does not allow hostile mobs to spawn. Please enable this in server properties before changin' settings!
easter_egg.parrot.1: The parrot thanks ye for yer kindness...
easter_egg.parrot.3: The parrot would like to be yer best friend...
easter_egg.parrot.4: The parrot wishes for this moment to last forever...
customizer.map_owner: %s be in control of game settings!
chat.confirm: Please confirm game settings at the %s!
chat.new_here: It seems like ye're new to %s.
chat.recommend: We highly recommend ye to check out the %s before playin' the actual game!
chat.warp_pad: Ye can go there by usin' the blue warp pad on the left side of the Lobby.
credits.zeronia: Stay up to date wit' our projects!
book.title: Lobby Book
book.welcome.2: A game where 2 teams o' pirates fight to get loot and destroy each other's ships usin' their Cannons!
book.how_to_play.1: At the start of the game, pirates must jump off their ships, swim to the center island, and open %1$s to find resources and weapons. %2$s
book.how_to_play.2: Don't wait at the island for too long or ye could die wit' all yer items!
book.how_to_play.3: Once ye have enough resources, ye can bring 'em back to yer ship and use 'em to buy a variety o' %1$s. Each one does somethin' special. %2$s
book.how_to_play.4: Read the item descriptions to learn about what they do!
book.how_to_play.5: %1$s have 2 side slots. Put up to 7 %2$s in these to change the power and angle of yer shot. After that, load yer %3$s in the middle and shoot! %4$s
book.how_to_play.6: Ye can use a %s first to preview where yer shot will land!
book.how_to_play.7: The %1$s isn't just for show: ye can use it to expose %2$s on the enemy ship! Hittin' %3$s %4$s wit' %5$s will deal a lot o' damage. %6$s
book.how_to_play.8: Try to learn how to aim for 'em usin' different %1$s and %2$s!
lobby.label.tutorial: (a special island used to learn about the game's mechanics)
lobby.label.parkour.2: (complete the course as fast as possible)
lobby.label.credits.2: (interact wit' the armor stands to read the credits)
modifier.no_tracers.description: Removes Tracer Cannonballs from pirate loadouts, forcin' pirates to learn how to aim without 'em.
modifier.wildlife.description: Adds feisty Sharks and pesky Crabs to the map. Sharks lurk the waters in search of prey, while Crabs roam the island and try to steal yer loot!
modifier.sea_storms.description: Let it rain! In the heavy downpour and winds, yer Cannonballs will become wildly inaccurate. Beware of lightnin' on the central island!
modifier.lost_cargo.description: Barrels o' loot emerge from the waters around yer ship! If ye can't make it to the central island, ye'll still be able to obtain materials somehow.
modifier.grave_robbery.description: When ye die, a gravestone spawns at yer death location which contains up to 5 of yer previous items. Ye better loot it quick before somebody else does!
